name: zombios.io online multiplayer
description:
"Zombios IO" is an exciting online multiplayer strategy. You need to get a lot of wood and stone to get ready for the battle for survival among the bloodthirsty zombies! Earn gold for which you can build your own base and protect yourself and your treasures from terrible zombies. You can create walls, set up defensive towers and lay mines to earn even more gold to buy improvements. Zombies io attack you periodically, so use a maximum of time and dexterity to extract resources and build buildings. You will also meet other players, in some of them you can create a team to survive it was easier. Good luck in the new super cool game "Zombios IO"!
The fascinating gameplay is very similar to our popular game moofarm io, we know that you love it, and we made a new game but on the old shell
Play with friends and build farms and we will already take care of that you would happily spend time destroying zombs because our io games are worthy of attention

Good luck games and durable battles against zombs
